{"id":1811785237,"question_id":4083,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1761447826,"status":12,"status_display":"Memory Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1811785237/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Stable Subarrays With Equal Boundary and Interior Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long countStableSubarrays(vector<int>& capacity) {\n        int N = (int)capacity.size();\n        vector<long long> pref(N+1, 0);\n        for (int i=1; i<=N; i++)\n            pref[i] = pref[i-1] + capacity[i-1];    \n\n        long long ans = 0;\n        unordered_map<int, unordered_map<long long, vector<int>>> m;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            auto l = m[capacity[i]][pref[i] - 2*capacity[i]];\n            int cnt = 0;\n            for (int j=(int)l.size()-1; j>=0; j--) {\n                if ((i+1) - l[j] >= 3)\n                    break;\n                cnt++;\n            }\n            ans += (int)l.size() - cnt;\n            \n            m[capacity[i]][pref[i]].push_back(i);\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"stable-subarrays-with-equal-boundary-and-interior-sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1290}
